title: Agri-tech company, Agrizy, raises $4 million seed funding led by Ankur Capital - Economic Times
content: Agri-tech company, Agrizy, raises $4 million seed funding led by Ankur Capital  Economic Times
description: The funds raised will be utilized to build strong business and engineering teams, develop a suite of digital services for the processed agri marketplace and ramp up customer traction in targeted value chains across various locations in India.
